card.name: Scrabbling Claws
card.text: {T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her graveyard. {1}, Sacrifice Scrabbling Claws: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

card.name: Sculpting Steel
card.text: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

card.name: Scythe of the Wretched
Seat of the Synod
card.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Second Sunrise
card.text: Each player returns to the battlefield all artifact, creature, enchantment, and land cards in his or her graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Seething Song
card.text: Add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Serum Tank
card.text: Whenever Serum Tank or another artifact enters the battlefield, put a charge counter on Serum Tank. {3}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Serum Tank: Draw a card.

card.name: Shared Fate
card.text: If a player would draw a card, that player exiles the top card of an opponent's library face down instead. Each player may look at and play cards he or she exiled with Shared Fate.

card.name: Shatter
card.text: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Shrapnel Blast
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Shrapnel Blast, sacrifice an artifact. Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Silver Myr
card.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Skeleton Shard
card.text: {3}, {T} or {B}, {T}: Return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Skyhunter Cub
card.text: As long as Skyhunter Cub is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

card.name: Skyhunter Patrol
card.text: Flying, first strike

card.name: Slagwurm Armor
card.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+6. Equip {3}

card.name: Slith Ascendant
card.text: Flying Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Slith Bloodletter
card.text: Whenever Slith Bloodletter deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{B}: Regenerate Slith Bloodletter.

card.name: Slith Firewalker
card.text: Haste Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Slith Predator
card.text: Trample Whenever Slith Predator deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Slith Strider
card.text: Whenever Slith Strider becomes blocked, draw a card. Whenever Slith Strider deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Solar Tide
card.text: Choose one - Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less; or destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. Entwine - Sacrifice two lands.

card.name: Soldier Replica
card.text: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Soldier Replica: Soldier Replica deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.text: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Somber Hoverguard
card.text: Affinity for artifacts Flying

card.name: Soul Foundry
card.text: Imprint - When Soul Foundry enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your hand. {X}, {T}: Put a token that's a copy of the exiled card onto the battlefield. X is the converted mana cost of that card.

card.name: Soul Nova
card.text: Exile target attacking creature and all Equipment attached to it.

card.name: Spellweaver Helix
card.text: Imprint - When Spellweaver Helix enters the battlefield, you may exile two target sorcery cards from a single graveyard. Whenever a player casts a card, if it has the same name as one of the cards exiled with Spellweaver Helix, you may copy the other. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Sphere of Purity
card.text: If an artifact would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Spikeshot Goblin
card.text: {R}, {T}: Spikeshot Goblin deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

card.name: Spoils of the Vault
card.text: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal the named card, then put that card into your hand. Exile all other cards revealed this way, and you lose 1 life for each of the exiled cards.

card.name: Stalking Stones
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {6}: Stalking Stones becomes a 3/3 Elemental artifact creature that's still a land.

card.name: Sun Droplet
card.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, put that many charge counters on Sun Droplet. At the beginning of each upkeep, you may remove a charge counter from Sun Droplet. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sunbeam Spellbomb
card.text: {W}, Sacrifice Sunbeam Spellbomb: You gain 5 life. {1}, Sacrifice Sunbeam Spellbomb: Draw a card.

card.name: Sword of Kaldra
Sylvan Scrying
card.text: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Synod Sanctum
card.text: {2}, {T}: Exile target permanent you control. {2}, Sacrifice Synod Sanctum: Return all cards exiled with Synod Sanctum to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Taj-Nar Swordsmith
card.text: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Talisman of Dominance
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Talisman of Dominance deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Talisman of Impulse
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Talisman of Impulse deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Talisman of Indulgence
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Talisman of Indulgence deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Talisman of Progress
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Talisman of Progress deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Talisman of Unity
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Talisman of Unity deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Tanglebloom
card.text: {1}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Tangleroot
card.text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, that player adds {G} to his or her mana pool.

card.text: Protection from artifacts; reach

card.name: Tel-Jilad Chosen
card.text: Protection from artifacts

card.name: Tel-Jilad Exile
card.text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Tel-Jilad Exile.

card.name: Tel-Jilad Stylus
card.text: {T}: Put target permanent you own on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Tempest of Light
card.text: Destroy all enchantments.

card.name: Temporal Cascade
card.text: Choose one - Each player shuffles his or her hand and graveyard into his or her library; or each player draws seven cards. Entwine {2}

card.name: Terror
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Thirst for Knowledge
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

card.name: Thought Prison
card.text: Imprint - When Thought Prison enters the battlefield, you may have target player reveal his or her hand. If you do, choose a nonland card from it and exile that card. Whenever a player casts a spell that shares a color or converted mana cost with the exiled card, Thought Prison deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Thoughtcast
card.text: Affinity for artifacts Draw two cards.

card.name: Timesifter
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, each player exiles the top card of his or her library. The player who exiled the card with the highest converted mana cost takes an extra turn after this one. If two or more players' cards are tied for highest cost, the tied players repeat this process until the tie is broken.

card.name: Titanium Golem
card.text: {1}{W}: Titanium Golem gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Tooth and Nail
card.text: Choose one - Search your library for up to two creature cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library; or put up to two creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Entwine {2}

card.text: Flash Affinity for artifacts {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Tower of Murmurs

card.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Wall of Blood

card.name: Wanderguard Sentry
card.text: When Wanderguard Sentry enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

card.name: War Elemental
card.text: When War Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless an opponent was dealt damage this turn. Whenever an opponent is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on War Elemental.

card.name: Worldslayer

card.name: Wrench Mind
card.text: Target player discards two cards unless he or she discards an artifact card.

card.name: Wurmskin Forger
card.text: When Wurmskin Forger enters the battlefield, distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures.
